title: Domino's
summary: A Domino’s Store in Your Pocket
description: Want a Domino’s store in your pocket, anywhere, anytime? Now you can with the Domino’s app!Features:-     New On Time Cooking is now available so your pizza is ready as soon as you walk in to store to pick up your order-     Receive notifications for great deals from your local store-     Quickly and easily scan your credit card details using the camera on your phone -     Get Pizza Tracker notifications directly on your Android Wear smart watch-     Display Pizza Tracker on your TV and use your phone for other activities with the Chromecast casting feature-     Build a better pizza using the all new Domino’s Pizza Chef®-     Order your favourite pizza, sides and desserts from the easy to navigate menu-     Track your order from the store to your door with the live Domino’s Pizza Tracker*Pricing shown may not be representative of pricing within the Ordering App
descriptionHTML:
Want a Domino’s store in your pocket, anywhere, anytime? Now you can with the Domino’s app!

Features:
- New On Time Cooking is now available so your pizza is ready as soon as you walk in to store to pick up your order
- Receive notifications for great deals from your local store
- Quickly and easily scan your credit card details using the camera on your phone
- Get Pizza Tracker notifications directly on your Android Wear smart watch
- Display Pizza Tracker on your TV and use your phone for other activities with the Chromecast casting feature
- Build a better pizza using the all new Domino’s Pizza Chef®
- Order your favourite pizza, sides and desserts from the easy to navigate menu
- Track your order from the store to your door with the live Domino’s Pizza Tracker

*Pricing shown may not be representative of pricing within the Ordering App
comments: The current app has improved a lot over previous versions but can still be a little slow when navigating back and forth for your order. Also the pop-up adds can be a pain and get in the way. Other than that it's way better than the Pizza hut one.

Very slow to do anything and the new drew thing unfortunately doesn't understand English words, let alone Maori words... Pretty useless.. I still like the pizza, get rid of drew assist and the constant pop ups to add to order.. and get the road names of where your stores are correct spelling it would better... I resort to using web to order as it's quicker...AND SICK OF THE STUPID POP UPS SO MUCH.GRRRRRRRR

Recent update with order tracker and timer means if you select timer it. Resets despite charging card. I've been to the store and they are remaking which is fine but this is a breaking glitch.  Defeats the purpose of ordering ahead

Better to download this you can do it on website atleast they will show you some updates and deals and i think It's nonsense app.  and it should be more responsive and it would be good if it's showing new deal or specials
A little bit difficult to navigate around but good. Credit card scanning feature doesn't work on a galaxy note 8 for some reason
It is a little laggy, but does the job just fine. Def. better than no app)
